name: PlatJump
description: PlatJump is a level-based runner game that turns into a platformer. The player has to jump over enemies that run at them and survive for a specific amount of time per level. After that time, platforms appear and the player can jump on them, getting to the top one, which advances the player to the next level. Each level, the enemies get faster and bigger while the player gains abilities such as double jump, faster movement, and a higher jump in general.
